property.name: searchCoursesSql
property.value: select course_id,name,description,price from course where description like :description and price>:priceLimit

property.name: searchTrainersSql
property.value: select t.name as trainer_name, t.email, c.name as course_name, c.description from trainer t join course c on t.course_id=c.course_id where c.price>:priceLimit

property.name: searchCoursesWithTimeScheduleSql
property.value: select c.name, c.description, t.schedule_time from course c join time_schedule t on c.course_id = t.course_id where t.schedule_time like :scheduleTime

property.name: searchUsersSql
property.value: select name, email, address from users where name like :name

property.name: insertTrainerSql
property.value: insert into trainer (trainer_id, course_id, name, email) values (:trainerId, :courseId, :name, :email)

property.name: updateCourseSql
property.value: update course set description = :description where price >:price
